sentences.sContent: Free speech is being gradually eroded year after year by new tentacles of government control.
sentences.sCn: 言论自由正被政府控制的新触角逐渐侵蚀。

remMethod.val: tent(感觉) + acle(表物， 名词后缀) → 用于感知的东西 → 触角

trans.tranOther: one of the long thin parts of a sea creature such as an  octopus  which it uses for holding things
